https://tmrev.io/movie/87557-Curtis Mayfield: Live at Ronnie Scott's 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null This Concert film from 1988 captures the full power of one of the giants of black American music in performance and, as a bonus, also includes an Interview Mayfield gave at the time to life-long fan Paul Weller. Curtis Mayfield: Live at Ronnie Scott's
